verses.text: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Where|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s \w certificate|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w divorce|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*? \w Or|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w creditors|strong="H5383"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*? \w Look|strong="H2005"\w*, \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w were|strong="H5612"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* mother \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* black \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* \w covering|strong="H3682"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* has \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w My|strong="H6605"\w* ears, \w and|strong="H6605"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H5472"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w back|strong="H1460"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* those \w who|strong="H5221"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* those \w who|strong="H5221"\w* tore \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w beard|strong="H4803"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* scorn \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w spittle|strong="H7536"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w helps|strong="H5826"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w disgraced|strong="H3637"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w flint|strong="H2496"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5975"\w* \w One|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w vindicates|strong="H6663"\w* \w Me|strong="H5975"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w*. \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* dare \w to|strong="H5066"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H7378"\w* \w Me|strong="H5975"\w*? Let \w him|strong="H5975"\w* \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* \w Me|strong="H5975"\w*!

\w Surely|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w helps|strong="H5826"\w* \w Me|strong="H7561"\w*. \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w Me|strong="H7561"\w*? \w See|strong="H2005"\w*, \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w wear|strong="H1086"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H6211"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* moths \w will|strong="H4310"\w* devour \w them|strong="H1086"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w fears|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w obeys|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w walks|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H4310"\w* \w light|strong="H5051"\w*? \w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w trust|strong="H8172"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
